title: Christy Organics
description: Made with 100% natural ingredients, all Christy Organics perfumes are free from synthetic notes, chemical preservatives and additives. They’re also free from alcohol, parabens, phthalates, and are vegan and cruelty-free, too.

title: Iba Pure Perfumes
description: Made with pure ingredients, all of Iba’s products are free from alcohol, animal-derived ingredients or harsh chemicals such as sulfates, parabens, ammonia and bleaching agents.

title: Wardah Beauty
description: Wardah Beauty is an Indonesian cosmetic brand that is a pioneer in halal beauty products. The brand is proud to have been halal from its beginnings. It offers a strong portfolio of halal skincare and make-up, as well as fragrances for women

title: Ridha Naturals
description: The brand is completely natural, using ingredients that are kind to the planet and your skin. Their range of 100% halal, plant-based, natural, alcohol-free oil perfumes will transition you to a place far away, while simultaneously uplifting the body and soul.

title: Ink & Ocean
description: Ink & Ocean’s botanical, halal perfumes are crafted using plant extracts, resins, plant tinctures and flowers in a base of oil. It’s exactly how the ancients made perfume! Crafted from organic ingredients and pure essential oils, these halal fragrances are bespoke at an affordable price.

title: Sunnamusk
description: The specialist fragrance house based in London works alongside a highly skilled team of perfumers to produce their exclusive range of pure fine oils and Eau de Parfum.
